attributes.additional_details:
The plan is seen as an attack on vulnerable disabled groups.
While there is need for disabled who can work to do so many disabled can only get through jobs through specialist employment agencies. 
The way to resolve this better is social change addressing bias against disabled.
attributes.background: Rethink plans for disability benefits which will penalise some of the most vulnerable in country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
